head.title: A Night for Doubletakes in Hoboken

identified-content.classifier: Top/Classifieds/Job Market/Job Categories/Music, Theater and Dance

hedline.hl1: A Night for Doubletakes in Hoboken

abstract.p: Ernie Contri, whose voice is ringer for Frank Sinatra, will perform in free concert for Sinatra Park in Hoboken, NJ (S)

block.p: From the mid-1980's to the early-1990's, Ernie Contri had a virtual lock on the annual Greenwich Village Perform as Your Favorite Performer contest. His forte: Frank Sinatra. He was a vocal ringer for Ol' Blue Eyes, and he won handily, beating out many a Madonna and a Doris Day. He also always brought the crowd to a fever pitch.

He has continued to croon, and whether it's a Frank Sinatra tribute or an evening of standards, the man provides the goods. And how appropriate is this concert for Sinatra Park? The show, at 7 p.m. on Thursday, is part of Hoboken's Enchanted Evenings free concerts. Bring a blanket or lawn chair and enjoy the summer wind.
